Sept. 7, 1907 D Ynyshir Contest
Ynyshir Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
ynyshir-contest
None
Gems of Haydn [arr. W. Rimmer]
Ynyshir, Glamorgan
1st prize £8 and cup. 2nd prize £2.10s. March contest 1st (£1) Gilfachgoch, 2nd (10s.) Cwmaman. 2 bands only competed.
April 6, 2012, 5:21 p.m. July 6, 2015, 12:17 p.m.
1 Gilfachgoch W. G. Paterson
2 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band H. S. Thomas
